name: Wonderlight
description:
The Bolmos, a highly advanced race of beans, love gobstoppers! They recently discovered a massive floating gobstopper in orbit around a random star in a random place. They opened up their Intergalactic portals, input the coordinates, and off they went! You are a random 4th dimension creature from uhh.. the 4th dimension. You see these random beans coming out of a portal and you decide to mess with them!

Tab - Open Menu,
Click - Select,
G - Grab,
Space - Move up,
Left Control - Move Down,
WASD - Move Around,
Backspace - Delete,
Alt F4 - Exit.

Made in Collaboration with Redblox Studios.
